rules_text:
Kicker {1}{R} and/or {1}{W} [i](You may pay an additional {1}{R} and/or {1}{W} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
If Tyrovolver was kicked with its {1}{R} kicker, when it enters the battlefield, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and has haste.
If Tyrovolver was kicked with its {1}{W} kicker, when it enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact or enchantment.
